snippet.title: Yoku's Island Express - Abilities Trailer (Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4 & Xbox One)
snippet.description:
Unlock amazing new abilities as you flip and bump your way around Mokumana Island! 

Harness the power of explosive slugs with the Slug Vacuum, explore the deep with the Dive Fish, and wake up sleepy villagers with the Noisemaker!

Yoku's Island Express is coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch and Steam in Q2 2018.

Official site: https://www.team17.com/games/yokus-island-express/
Steam store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/334940/Yokus_Island_Express/

Follow Yoku's Island Express on Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/YokuGame
Follow Yoku's Island Express on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/YokuGame/
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/
Follow Team17 on Twitter: http://bit.ly/FollowT17
